 1915: 
 1916: reader_groups_map(CPUT, Groups) ->
 1917:     Old = erlang:system_info({cpu_topology, defined}),
 1918:     erlang:system_flag(cpu_topology, CPUT),
 1919:     enable_internal_state(),
 1920:     Res = erts_debug:get_internal_state({reader_groups_map, Groups}),
 1921:     erlang:system_flag(cpu_topology, Old),
 1922:     lists:sort(Res).
 1923: 
 1924: otp_16446(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1925:     ct:timetrap({minutes, 1}),
 1926:     
 1927:     process_flag(priority, high),
 1928: 
 1929:     DIO = erlang:system_info(dirty_io_schedulers),
 1930:     NoPrioProcs = 10*DIO,
 1931:     io:format("DIO = ~p~nNoPrioProcs = ~p~n", [DIO, NoPrioProcs]),
 1932: 
 1933:     DirtyLoop = fun Loop(P, N) ->
 1934:                         erts_debug:dirty_io(wait,1),
 1935:                         receive {get, From} -> From ! {P, N}
 1936:                         after 0 -> Loop(P,N+1)
 1937:                         end
 1938:                 end,
 1939: 
 1940:     Spawn = fun SpawnLoop(_Prio, 0, Acc) ->
 1941:                     Acc;
 1942:                 SpawnLoop(Prio, N, Acc) ->
 1943:                     Pid = spawn_opt(fun () -> DirtyLoop(Prio, 0) end,
 1944:                                     [link, {priority, Prio}]),
 1945:                     SpawnLoop(Prio, N-1, [Pid|Acc])
 1946:             end,
 1947: 
 1948:     Ns = Spawn(normal, NoPrioProcs, []),
 1949:     Ls = Spawn(low, NoPrioProcs, []),
 1950: 
 1951:     receive after 10000 -> ok end,
 1952:     
 1953:     RequestInfo = fun (P) -> P ! {get, self()} end,
 1954:     lists:foreach(RequestInfo, Ns),
 1955:     lists:foreach(RequestInfo, Ls),
 1956:     
 1957:     Collect = fun CollectFun(0, LLs, NLs) ->
 1958:                       {LLs, NLs};
 1959:                   CollectFun(N, LLs, NLs) ->
 1960:                       receive
 1961:                           {low, Calls} ->
 1962:                               CollectFun(N-1, LLs+Calls, NLs);
 1963:                           {normal, Calls} ->
 1964:                               CollectFun(N-1, LLs, NLs+Calls)
 1965:                       end
 1966:               end,
 1967:     
 1968:     {LLs, NLs} = Collect(2*NoPrioProcs, 0, 0),
 1969:     
 1970:     %% expected ratio 0.125, but this is not especially exact...
 1971:     Ratio = LLs / NLs,
 1972: 
 1973:     io:format("LLs = ~p~nNLs = ~p~nRatio = ~p~n", [LLs, NLs, Ratio]),
 1974:     
 1975:     true = Ratio > 0.05,
 1976:     true = Ratio < 0.5,
 1977:     
 1978:     WaitUntilDead = fun (P) ->
 1979:                             case is_process_alive(P) of
 1980:                                 false ->
 1981:                                     ok;
 1982:                                 true ->
 1983:                                     unlink(P),
 1984:                                     exit(P, kill),
 1985:                                     false = is_process_alive(P)
 1986:                             end
 1987:                     end,
 1988: 
 1989:     lists:foreach(WaitUntilDead, Ns),
 1990:     lists:foreach(WaitUntilDead, Ls),
 1991:     Comment = "low/normal ratio: " ++ erlang:float_to_list(Ratio,[{decimals,4}]),
 1992:     erlang:display(Comment),
 1993:     {comment, Comment}.
 1994: 
 1995: simultaneously_change_schedulers_online(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1996:     SchedOnline = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
 1997:     Change = fun Change (0) ->
 1998:                      ok;
 1999:                  Change (N) ->
 2000:                      %timer:sleep(rand:uniform(100)),
 2001:                      erlang:system_flag(schedulers_online,
 2002:                                         rand:uniform(erlang:system_info(schedulers))),
 2003:                      Change(N-1)
 2004:              end,
 2005:     PMs = lists:map(fun (_) ->
 2006:                             spawn_monitor(fun () -> Change(10) end)
 2007:                     end, lists:seq(1,2500)),
 2008:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 2009:                           receive
 2010:                               {'DOWN', M, process, P, normal} ->
 2011:                                   ok
 2012:                           end
 2013:                   end,
 2014:                   PMs),
 2015:     erlang:system_flag(schedulers_online, SchedOnline),
 2016:     ok.
 2017: 
 2018: simultaneously_change_schedulers_online_with_exits(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2019:     SchedOnline = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
 2020:     Change = fun Change (0) ->
 2021:                      exit(bye);
 2022:                  Change (N) ->
 2023:                      %timer:sleep(rand:uniform(100)),
 2024:                      erlang:system_flag(schedulers_online,
 2025:                                         rand:uniform(erlang:system_info(schedulers))),
 2026:                      Change(N-1)
 2027:              end,
 2028:     PMs = lists:map(fun (_) ->
 2029:                             spawn_monitor(fun () -> Change(10) end)
 2030:                     end, lists:seq(1,2500)),
 2031:     %% Kill every 10:th process...
 2032:     _ = lists:foldl(fun ({P, _M}, 0) ->
 2033:                             exit(P, bye),
 2034:                             10;
 2035:                         (_PM, N) ->
 2036:                             N-1
 2037:                     end,
 2038:                     10,
 2039:                     PMs),
 2040:     lists:foreach(fun ({P, M}) ->
 2041:                           receive
 2042:                               {'DOWN', M, process, P, Reason} ->
 2043:                                   bye = Reason
 2044:                           end
 2045:                   end,
 2046:                   PMs),
 2047:     erlang:system_flag(schedulers_online, SchedOnline),
 2048:     ok.
 2049: 
 2050: 
 2051: %%
 2052: %% Utils
 2053: %%
 2054: 
 2055: sched_state() ->
 2056:     sched_state(erlang:system_info(all_schedulers_state),
 2057: 		undefined,
 2058: 		{dirty_cpu,0,0,0},
 2059: 		{dirty_io,0,0,0}).
 2060: 
 2061: 	    
 2062: sched_state([], N, DC, DI) ->
 2063:     try
 2064: 	chk_basic(N),
 2065: 	chk_basic(DC),
 2066: 	chk_basic(DI),
 2067: 	{N, DC, DI}
 2068:     catch
 2069: 	_ : _ ->
 2070: 	    ct:fail({inconsisten_scheduler_state, {N, DC, DI}})
 2071:     end;
 2072: sched_state([{normal, _, _, _} = S | Rest], _S, DC, DI) ->
 2073:     sched_state(Rest, S, DC, DI);
 2074: sched_state([{dirty_cpu, _, _, _} = DC | Rest], S, _DC, DI) ->
 2075:     sched_state(Rest, S, DC, DI);
 2076: sched_state([{dirty_io, _, _, _} = DI | Rest], S, DC, _DI) ->
 2077:     sched_state(Rest, S, DC, DI).
 2078: 
 2079: chk_basic({_Type, Tot, Onln, Act}) ->
 2080:     true = Tot >= Onln,
 2081:     true = Onln >= Act.
 2082: 
 2083: l(Id) ->
 2084:     {logical, Id}.
 2085: 
 2086: t(X) ->
 2087:     {thread, X}.
 2088: 
 2089: c(X) ->
 2090:     {core, X}.
 2091: 
 2092: p(X) ->
 2093:     {processor, X}.
 2094: 
 2095: n(X) ->
 2096:     {node, X}.
 2097: 
 2098: mcall(Node, Funs) ->
 2099:     Parent = self(),
 2100:     Refs = lists:map(fun (Fun) ->
 2101:                              Ref = make_ref(),
 2102:                              Pid = spawn(Node,
 2103:                                          fun () ->
 2104:                                                  Res = Fun(),
 2105:                                                  unlink(Parent),
 2106:                                                  Parent ! {Ref, Res}
 2107:                                          end),
 2108:                              MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 2109:                              {Ref, MRef}
 2110:                      end, Funs),
 2111:     lists:map(fun ({Ref, MRef}) ->
 2112:                       receive
 2113:                           {Ref, Res} ->
 2114:                               receive
 2115:                                   {'DOWN',MRef,_,_,_} ->
 2116:                                       Res
 2117:                               end;
 2118:                           {'DOWN',MRef,_,_,Reason} ->
 2119:                               Reason
 2120:                       end
 2121:               end, Refs).
 2122: 
 2123: erl_rel_flag_var() ->
 2124:     "ERL_OTP"++erlang:system_info(otp_release)++"_FLAGS".
 2125: 
 2126: clear_erl_rel_flags() ->
 2127:     EnvVar = erl_rel_flag_var(),
 2128:     case os:getenv(EnvVar) of
 2129: 	false ->
 2130: 	    false;
 2131: 	Value ->
 2132: 	    os:putenv(EnvVar, ""),
 2133: 	    Value
 2134:     end.
 2135: 
 2136: restore_erl_rel_flags(false) ->
 2137:     ok;
 2138: restore_erl_rel_flags(OldValue) ->
 2139:     os:putenv(erl_rel_flag_var(), OldValue),
 2140:     ok.
 2141: 
 2142: ok(too_slow, _Config) ->
 2143:     {comment, "Too slow system to do any actual testing..."};
 2144: ok(_Res, Config) ->
 2145:     proplists:get_value(ok_res, Config).
 2146: 
 2147: chk_result(too_slow,
 2148:            _LWorkers,
 2149:            _NWorkers,
 2150:            _HWorkers,
 2151:            _MWorkers,
 2152:            _LNShouldWork,
 2153:            _HShouldWork,
 2154:            _MShouldWork) ->
 2155:     ok;
 2156: chk_result([{low, L, Lmin, _Lmax},
 2157:             {normal, N, Nmin, _Nmax},
 2158:             {high, H, Hmin, _Hmax},
 2159:             {max, M, Mmin, _Mmax}] = Res,
 2160:            LWorkers,
 2161:            NWorkers,
 2162:            HWorkers,
 2163:            MWorkers,
 2164:            LNShouldWork,
 2165:            HShouldWork,
 2166:            MShouldWork) ->
 2167:     io:format("~p~n", [Res]),
 2168:     Relax = relax_limits(),
 2169:     case {L, N} of
 2170:         {0, 0} ->
 2171:             false = LNShouldWork;
 2172:         _ ->
 2173:             {LminRatioLim,
 2174:              NminRatioLim,
 2175:              LNRatioLimMin,
 2176:              LNRatioLimMax} = case Relax of
 2177:                                   false -> {0.5, 0.5, 0.05, 0.25};
 2178:                                   true -> {0.05, 0.05, 0.01, 0.4}
 2179:                               end,
 2180:             Lavg = L/LWorkers,
 2181:             Navg = N/NWorkers,
 2182:             Ratio = Lavg/Navg,
 2183:             LminRatio = Lmin/Lavg,
 2184:             NminRatio = Nmin/Navg,
 2185:             io:format("low min ratio=~p~n"
 2186:                       "normal min ratio=~p~n"
 2187:                       "low avg=~p~n"
 2188:                       "normal avg=~p~n"
 2189:                       "low/normal ratio=~p~n",
 2190:                       [LminRatio, NminRatio, Lavg, Navg, Ratio]),
 2191:             erlang:display({low_min_ratio, LminRatio}),
 2192:             erlang:display({normal_min_ratio, NminRatio}),
 2193:             erlang:display({low_avg, Lavg}),
 2194:             erlang:display({normal_avg, Navg}),
 2195:             erlang:display({low_normal_ratio, Ratio}),
 2196:             chk_lim(LminRatioLim, LminRatio, 1.0, low_min_ratio),
 2197:             chk_lim(NminRatioLim, NminRatio, 1.0, normal_min_ratio),
 2198:             chk_lim(LNRatioLimMin, Ratio, LNRatioLimMax, low_normal_ratio),
 2199:             true = LNShouldWork,
 2200:             ok
 2201:     end,
 2202:     case H of
 2203:         0 ->
 2204:             false = HShouldWork;
 2205:         _ ->
 2206:             HminRatioLim = case Relax of
 2207:                                false -> 0.5;
 2208:                                true -> 0.1
 2209:                            end,
 2210:             Havg = H/HWorkers,
 2211:             HminRatio = Hmin/Havg,
 2212:             erlang:display({high_min_ratio, HminRatio}),
 2213:             chk_lim(HminRatioLim, HminRatio, 1.0, high_min_ratio),
 2214:             true = HShouldWork,
 2215:             ok
 2216:     end,
 2217:     case M of
 2218:         0 ->
 2219:             false = MShouldWork;
 2220:         _ ->
 2221:             MminRatioLim = case Relax of
 2222:                                false -> 0.5;
 2223:                                true -> 0.1
 2224:                            end,
 2225:             Mavg = M/MWorkers,
 2226:             MminRatio = Mmin/Mavg,
 2227:             erlang:display({max_min_ratio, MminRatio}),
 2228:             chk_lim(MminRatioLim, MminRatio, 1.0, max_min_ratio),
 2229:             true = MShouldWork,
 2230:             ok
 2231:     end,
 2232:     ok.
 2233: 
 2234: 	    
 2235: 	    
 2236: chk_lim(Min, V, Max, _What) when Min =< V, V =< Max ->
 2237:     ok;
 2238: chk_lim(_Min, V, _Max, What) ->
 2239:     ct:fail({bad, What, V}).
 2240: 
 2241: snd(_Msg, []) ->
 2242:     [];
 2243: snd(Msg, [P|Ps]) ->
 2244:     P ! Msg,
 2245:     Ps.
 2246: 
 2247: relax_limits() ->
 2248:     case strange_system_scale() of
 2249: 	Scale when Scale > 1 ->
 2250: 	    io:format("Relaxing limits~n", []),
 2251: 	    true;
 2252: 	_ ->
 2253: 	    false
 2254:     end.
 2255: 
 2256: strange_system_scale() ->
 2257:     S0 = 1,
 2258:     S1 = case erlang:system_info(schedulers_online)
 2259: 	     > erlang:system_info(logical_processors) of
 2260: 	     true -> S0*2;
 2261: 	     false -> S0
 2262: 	 end,
 2263:     S2 = case erlang:system_info(debug_compiled) of
 2264: 	     true -> S1*10;
 2265: 	     false ->
 2266: 		 case erlang:system_info(lock_checking) of
 2267: 		     true -> S1*2;
 2268: 		     false -> S1
 2269: 		 end
 2270: 	 end,
 2271:     S3 = case lock_counting() of
 2272: 	     true -> S2*2;
 2273: 	     false -> S2
 2274: 	 end,
 2275:     S3.
 2276: 
 2277: lock_counting() ->
 2278:     lock_counting(erlang:system_info(system_version)).
 2279: 
 2280: lock_counting([]) ->
 2281:     false;
 2282: lock_counting([$[,$l,$o,$c,$k,$-,$c,$o,$u,$n,$t,$i,$n,$g,$],_]) ->
 2283:     true;
 2284: lock_counting([_C|Cs]) ->
 2285:     lock_counting(Cs).
 2286: 
 2287: go_work([], [], [], []) ->
 2288:     [];
 2289: go_work(L, N, [], []) ->
 2290:     go_work(snd(go_work, L), snd(go_work, N), [], []);
 2291: go_work(L, N, H, []) ->
 2292:     go_work(L, N, snd(go_work, H), []);
 2293: go_work(L, N, H, M) ->
 2294:     go_work(L, N, H, snd(go_work, M)).
 2295: 
 2296: stop_work([], [], [], []) ->
 2297:     [];
 2298: stop_work([], [], [], M) ->
 2299:     stop_work([], [], [], snd(stop_work, M));
 2300: stop_work([], [], H, M) ->
 2301:     stop_work([], [], snd(stop_work, H), M);
 2302: stop_work(L, N, H, M) ->
 2303:     stop_work(snd(stop_work, L), snd(stop_work, N), H, M).
 2304: 
 2305: wait_balance(N) when is_integer(N) ->
 2306:     case erlang:system_info(schedulers_active) of
 2307: 	1 ->
 2308: 	    done;
 2309: 	_ ->
 2310: 	    erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state,true),
 2311: 	    Start = erts_debug:get_internal_state(nbalance),
 2312: 	    End = (Start + N) band ((1 bsl (8*erlang:system_info(wordsize)))-1),
 2313: 	    wait_balance(Start, End),
 2314: 	    erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state,false)
 2315:     end.
 2316: 
 2317: wait_balance(Start, End) ->
 2318:     X = erts_debug:get_internal_state(nbalance),
 2319:     case End =< X of
 2320: 	true ->
 2321: 	    case Start =< End of
 2322: 		true ->
 2323: 		    done;
 2324: 		false ->
 2325: 		    case X < Start of
 2326: 			true ->
 2327: 			    done;
 2328: 			false ->
 2329: 			    receive after 250 -> ok end,
 2330: 			    wait_balance(Start, End)
 2331: 		    end
 2332: 	    end;
 2333: 	false ->
 2334: 	    receive after 250 -> ok end,
 2335: 	    wait_balance(Start, End)
 2336:     end.
 2337: 
 2338: wait_reds(RedsLimit, Timeout) ->
 2339:     Stop = erlang:start_timer(Timeout, self(), stop),
 2340:     statistics(reductions),
 2341:     wait_reds(0, RedsLimit, Stop).
 2342: 
 2343: wait_reds(Reds, RedsLimit, Stop) when Reds < RedsLimit ->
 2344:     receive
 2345: 	{timeout, Stop, stop} ->
 2346: 	    erlang:display(timeout),
 2347: 	    erlang:display({reduction_limit, RedsLimit}),
 2348: 	    erlang:display({reductions, Reds}),
 2349: 	    done
 2350:     after 10000 ->
 2351: 	    {_, NewReds} = statistics(reductions),
 2352: 	    wait_reds(NewReds+Reds, RedsLimit, Stop)
 2353:     end;
 2354: wait_reds(Reds, RedsLimit, Stop) when is_reference(Stop) ->
 2355:     erlang:cancel_timer(Stop),
 2356:     receive {timeout, Stop, stop} -> ok after 0 -> ok end,
 2357:     wait_reds(Reds, RedsLimit, false);
 2358: wait_reds(Reds, RedsLimit, _Stop) ->
 2359:     erlang:display({reduction_limit, RedsLimit}),
 2360:     erlang:display({reductions, Reds}),
 2361:     done.
 2362: 
 2363: do_it(Tracer, Low, Normal, High, Max) ->
 2364:     do_it(Tracer, Low, Normal, High, Max, ?DEFAULT_TEST_REDS_PER_SCHED).
 2365: 
 2366: do_it(Tracer, Low, Normal, High, Max, RedsPerSchedLimit) ->
 2367:     OldPrio = process_flag(priority, max),
 2368:     go_work(Low, Normal, High, Max),
 2369:     StartWait = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 2370:     %% Give the emulator a chance to balance the load...
 2371:     wait_balance(5),
 2372:     EndWait = erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond),
 2373:     BalanceWait = EndWait-StartWait,
 2374:     erlang:display({balance_wait, BalanceWait}),
 2375:     Timeout = (15 - 4)*60*1000 - BalanceWait,
 2376:     Res = case Timeout < 60*1000 of
 2377: 	      true ->
 2378: 		  stop_work(Low, Normal, High, Max),
 2379: 		  too_slow;
 2380: 	      false ->
 2381: 		  set_tracing(true, Tracer, normal, Normal),
 2382: 		  set_tracing(true, Tracer, low, Low),
 2383: 		  set_tracing(true, Tracer, high, High),
 2384: 		  set_tracing(true, Tracer, max, Max),
 2385: 		  wait_reds(RedsPerSchedLimit
 2386: 			    * erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
 2387: 			    Timeout),
 2388: 		  set_tracing(false, Tracer, normal, Normal),
 2389: 		  set_tracing(false, Tracer, low, Low),
 2390: 		  set_tracing(false, Tracer, high, High),
 2391: 		  set_tracing(false, Tracer, max, Max),
 2392: 		  stop_work(Low, Normal, High, Max),
 2393: 		  get_trace_result(Tracer)
 2394: 	  end,
 2395:     process_flag(priority, OldPrio),
 2396:     Res.
 2397: 
 2398: workers_exit([]) ->
 2399:     ok;
 2400: workers_exit([P|Ps]) when is_pid(P) ->
 2401:     Mon = erlang:monitor(process, P),
 2402:     unlink(P),
 2403:     exit(P, kill),
 2404:     workers_exit(Ps),
 2405:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, P, _} -> ok end,
 2406:     ok;
 2407: workers_exit([[]]) ->
 2408:     ok;
 2409: workers_exit([Ps|Pss])  ->
 2410:     workers_exit(Ps),
 2411:     workers_exit(Pss).
 2412: 
 2413: do_work(PartTime) ->
 2414:     _ = id(lists:seq(1, 50)),
 2415:     receive stop_work -> receive after infinity -> ok end after 0 -> ok end,
 2416:     case PartTime of
 2417: 	true -> receive after 1 -> ok end;
 2418: 	false -> ok
 2419:     end,
 2420:     do_work(PartTime).
 2421: 
 2422: id(I) -> I.
 2423: 
 2424: workers(N, _Prio, _PartTime) when N =< 0 ->
 2425:     [];
 2426: workers(N, Prio, PartTime) ->
 2427:     Parent = self(),
 2428:     W = spawn_opt(fun () ->
 2429: 			  Parent ! {ready, self()},
 2430: 			  receive
 2431: 			      go_work ->
 2432: 				  do_work(PartTime)
 2433: 			  end
 2434: 		  end,
 2435: 		  [{priority, Prio}, link]),
 2436:     Ws = workers(N-1, Prio, PartTime),
 2437:     receive {ready, W} -> ok end,
 2438:     [W|Ws].
 2439: 
 2440: workers(N, Prio) ->
 2441:     workers(N, Prio, false).
 2442: 
 2443: part_time_workers(N, Prio) ->
 2444:     workers(N, Prio, true).
 2445: 
 2446: tracer(Low, Normal, High, Max) ->
 2447:     receive
 2448:         {tracees, Prio, Tracees} ->
 2449:             save_tracees(Prio, Tracees),
 2450:             case Prio of
 2451:                 low -> tracer(Tracees++Low, Normal, High, Max);
 2452:                 normal -> tracer(Low, Tracees++Normal, High, Max);
 2453:                 high -> tracer(Low, Normal, Tracees++High, Max);
 2454:                 max -> tracer(Low, Normal, High, Tracees++Max)
 2455:             end;
 2456:         {get_result, Ref, Who} ->
 2457:             Delivered = erlang:trace_delivered(all),
 2458:             receive
 2459:                 {trace_delivered, all, Delivered} ->
 2460:                     ok
 2461:             end,
 2462:             {Lc, Nc, Hc, Mc} = read_trace(),
 2463:             GetMinMax
 2464:             = fun (Prio, Procs) ->
 2465:                       LargeNum = 1 bsl 64,
 2466:                       case lists:foldl(fun (P, {Mn, Mx} = MnMx) ->
 2467:                                                {Prio, C} = get(P),
 2468:                                                case C < Mn of
 2469:                                                    true ->
 2470:                                                        case C > Mx of
 2471:                                                            true ->
 2472:                                                                {C, C};
 2473:                                                            false ->
 2474:                                                                {C, Mx}
 2475:                                                        end;
 2476:                                                    false ->
 2477:                                                        case C > Mx of
 2478:                                                            true -> {Mn, C};
 2479:                                                            false -> MnMx
 2480:                                                        end
 2481:                                                end
 2482:                                        end,
 2483:                                        {LargeNum, 0},
 2484:                                        Procs) of
 2485:                           {LargeNum, 0} -> {0, 0};
 2486:                           Res -> Res
 2487:                       end
 2488:               end,
 2489:             {Lmin, Lmax} = GetMinMax(low, Low),
 2490:             {Nmin, Nmax} = GetMinMax(normal, Normal),
 2491:             {Hmin, Hmax} = GetMinMax(high, High),
 2492:             {Mmin, Mmax} = GetMinMax(max, Max),
 2493:             Who ! {trace_result, Ref, [{low, Lc, Lmin, Lmax},
 2494:                                        {normal, Nc, Nmin, Nmax},
 2495:                                        {high, Hc, Hmin, Hmax},
 2496:                                        {max, Mc, Mmin, Mmax}]}
 2497:     end.
 2498: 
 2499: read_trace() ->
 2500:     read_trace(0,0,0,0).
 2501: 
 2502: read_trace(Low, Normal, High, Max) ->
 2503:     receive
 2504: 	{trace, Proc, in, _} ->
 2505: 	    {Prio, Count} = get(Proc),
 2506: 	    put(Proc, {Prio, Count+1}),
 2507: 	    case Prio of
 2508: 		low -> read_trace(Low+1, Normal, High, Max);
 2509: 		normal -> read_trace(Low, Normal+1, High, Max);
 2510: 		high -> read_trace(Low, Normal, High+1, Max);
 2511: 		max -> read_trace(Low, Normal, High, Max+1)
 2512: 	    end;
 2513: 	{trace, _Proc, out, _} ->
 2514: 	    read_trace(Low, Normal, High, Max)
 2515:     after 0 ->
 2516: 	    {Low, Normal, High, Max}
 2517:     end.
 2518: 
 2519: save_tracees(_Prio, []) ->
 2520:     ok;
 2521: save_tracees(Prio, [T|Ts]) ->
 2522:     put(T, {Prio, 0}),
 2523:     save_tracees(Prio, Ts).
 2524: 	    
 2525: start_tracer() ->
 2526:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun () -> tracer([], [], [], []) end),
 2527:     true = erlang:suspend_process(Tracer),
 2528:     Tracer.
 2529: 
 2530: get_trace_result(Tracer) ->
 2531:     erlang:resume_process(Tracer),
 2532:     Ref = make_ref(),
 2533:     Tracer ! {get_result, Ref, self()},
 2534:     receive
 2535: 	{trace_result, Ref, Res} ->
 2536: 	    Res
 2537:     end.
 2538: 	
 2539: 
 2540: set_tracing(_On, _Tracer, _Prio, []) ->
 2541:     ok;
 2542: set_tracing(true, Tracer, Prio, Pids) ->
 2543:     Tracer ! {tracees, Prio, Pids},
 2544:     set_tracing(true, Tracer, Pids);
 2545: set_tracing(false, Tracer, _Prio, Pids) ->
 2546:     set_tracing(false, Tracer, Pids).
 2547: 
 2548: set_tracing(_On, _Tracer, []) ->
 2549:     ok;
 2550: set_tracing(On, Tracer, [Pid|Pids]) ->
 2551:     1 = erlang:trace(Pid, On, [running, {tracer, Tracer}]),
 2552:     set_tracing(On, Tracer, Pids).
 2553:     
 2554: active_schedulers() ->
 2555:     case erlang:system_info(schedulers_online) of
 2556: 	1 ->
 2557: 	    1;
 2558: 	N ->
 2559: 	    case erlang:system_info(multi_scheduling) of
 2560: 		blocked -> 1;
 2561: 		enabled -> N
 2562: 	    end
 2563:     end.
 2564: 
 2565: enable_internal_state() ->
 2566:     case catch erts_debug:get_internal_state(available_internal_state) of
 2567: 	true -> true;
 2568: 	_ -> erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true)
 2569:     end.
 2570: 
 2571: cmp(X, X) ->
 2572:     ok;
 2573: cmp(X, Y) ->
 2574:     io:format("cmp failed:~n X=~p~n Y=~p~n", [X,Y]),
 2575:     cmp_aux(X, Y).
 2576: 
 2577: 
 2578: cmp_aux([X0|Y0], [X1|Y1]) ->
 2579:     cmp_aux(X0, X1),
 2580:     cmp_aux(Y0, Y1);
 2581: cmp_aux(T0, T1) when is_tuple(T0), is_tuple(T1), size(T0) == size(T1) ->
 2582:     cmp_tuple(T0, T1, 1, size(T0));
 2583: cmp_aux(X, X) ->
 2584:     ok;
 2585: cmp_aux(F0, F1) ->
 2586:     ct:fail({no_match, F0, F1}).
 2587: 
 2588: cmp_tuple(_T0, _T1, N, Sz) when N > Sz ->
 2589:     ok;
 2590: cmp_tuple(T0, T1, N, Sz) ->
 2591:     cmp_aux(element(N, T0), element(N, T1)),
 2592:     cmp_tuple(T0, T1, N+1, Sz).
